body:
The small buttons on the widget that switch between "Duel Progress" and "Difficulty Settings" are easy to overlook. This should be replaced with something less obscure.

An option can be to make the widget bigger and put all info in one panel. There's enough room for that.
author: [BeHold...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/116281131070537299190/)
title: Make difficulty settings easier to find
